divs: sighting details i was about 16years old . i am over 50 now. i can not remember the exact date so this is an approximation as to the date. the incident happened in hartwick township michigan between evart and marion. to be exact over what is now 80th ave., between hicks lake road and sunrise lake road. it was a clear, sunny, very nice day with few clouds. i guess it was around 1600 hrs. my dad called us older boys outside and made the little guys stay in the house. out to the west of the house about ��� mile away or less were a couple of saucer shaped , silver colored objects completely motionless in the sky above the tree line . i guess the altitude to be about 1,000 feet or less. then suddenly i saw another come in from the south and join them in formation. then another . i honestly don't remember the exact number of ships total but they formed a group of several identical craft . they came in fast like a blur that became solid and visible to the eye. my guess is that they were decelerating from an extremely high speed. my dad handed me a pair of binoculars and i could see the craft very clearly. i remember seeing symbols and shapes on the side of one of the craft. i can remember a couple of the shapes being a triangle, a crescent, and what looked like saturn or a circle with a ring through it. the other symbols i have never seen before or since. (i had 20\15 vision at the time). i was so fascinated with the symbols that i cant remember much more about the ships except they were metallic silver like stainless steel. i guess they were about 20-30 feet long and a smaller dome sat on the top. after handing the binoculars back to my dad . we watched them for a while longer and i just remember my dad muttering ���what the heck are those?��� i just thought at the time maybe we have some sort of secret weapons or something like that. then all at once they began to glow brightly the entire craft glowed like molten metal. then all at once they sped off faster than any lightning strike i had ever seen . it was a blur going up and out to the north. and they vanished in less than a split second. i never told anyone about this until i became old enough to realize that if i didn���t tell anyone, this information would be lost forever. i have never seen anything like this since.
Summary: We saw several disk or saucer sheped craft silver metalic in color in broad daylight could see words or symbols on sides They were motionless then glowed like fire and sped off in a blur at extreme speeds.
